sources.title: Daffidilly Daddy (1945)
sources.description: Daffidilly Daddy is a Little Lulu cartoon directed by Seymour Kneitel, Orestes Calpini. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/daffidilly-daddy-1945/

metadata.Plot: Little Lulu's daddy gives her a blue posey to exhibit at a flower show. She loses it on the way and a bulldog prevents her from reacquiring it, but she outwits him and proceeds to the show. There she breaks the stalk when she uses her bean-shooter at a hummingbird. She tosses the flower in a barrel of Vigaro and the flower suddenly bursts into bloom again.
metadata.Actors: Jackson Beck, Gilbert Mack, Cecil Roy
